fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Pout**: Pout at somebody, gaining a random ability of theirs.
**Fetch!**: Fetch something, letting you learn anybodyâ€™s role.
**Retrieve!**: Retrieve something, taking a bone from the Minecraft head.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Upon collecting 3 bones, transform into Wolf(Minecraft Mob)
-If you are killed, you attack your attacker.
-If somebody visits you three times in one game, you become their role, but keep your faction.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
